title: Nights at the Cuzco
description: What happens in Vegas could be deadly...Seduced by a prince, accused of stealing a priceless ancient necklace, then gleefully dissected by the media, world-famous acrobat Zia Jones suddenly finds her well-ordered life tumbling out of control. Sent to retrieve the necklace, security chief Juan Carlos Ramirez finds his feelings for Zia clouding his judgment instead. Too late, billionaire Prince Faoud realizes Zia means more to him than any priceless artifact once sheâ€™s gone. Now, Prince Faoud and Juan Carlos Ramirez will have to put their rivalry aside in order to find the necklace, and even more importantly, to save Zia. Not everyone at the Cuzco Resort Hotel & Casino loves Zia Jones. Someone will stop at nothing to tear her life apart, no matter what it takes.
author: Kara Jorges
